text: I'm a Soldier Mom () is a 1966 Soviet drama movie directed by Manos Zacharias.Медведев поздравил Шакурова с юбилеемЯ СОЛДАТ, МАМА It stars Vladimir Grammatikov, Anatoli Ilin, and Vladimir Serababin. == Actors == * Vladimir Grammatikov * Anatoli Ilin * Vladimir Serababin as Voloshin (as Vlandimir Serobabin) * Sergey Shakurov as Peganov * Valentin Zubkov == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1966 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Manos Zacharias
title: I'm a Soldier Mom
